pool.title: Governance pool {{value}}
pool.description: Staking into the Governance Pool to share revenue from trading fees and vote on project proposals.
pool.share_revenue: Share revenue from trading fees and vote on project proposals.
pool.share_revenue_nodata: Stake NAO to get 20% revenue shares from trading fees and voting rights
pool.revenue_share_from_trade: 20% revenue shares from trading fees and voting rights
pool.history_description: Profits are distributed at 07:00 every Monday (UTC+7)
pool.description_lock: The NAO Governance pool has been deposit-closed on ONUS since 2023-05-01 16:00 (UTC+7) and will be reopened at Nami Exchange in May.
pool.description_unlock: NAO staked will be locked and can only be claimed 7 days after unstaking, those NAO will not receive any revenue shares
pool.stake_message: Congratulations, you have successfully registered to stake
pool.unstake_message: Congratulations, you have successfully registered to unstake
pool.tooltip_auto: NAO staked will be automatically renewed for the next period
pool.tooltip_est_this_week: Profit based on the amount of NAO staked on the pool this period
pool.tooltip_profit_est: Estimated profit based on last period pool revenue and NAO staking
pool.tooltip_apy: Estimated yearly interest based on last week's total pool revenue
pool.tooltip_revenue_history: Total pool revenue shared from transaction fees, accumulated from Monday 00:00 (UTC+7) until now

vote.title: Proposals
vote.description: Track proposal statuses and vote on changes.
vote.nao_too_small: Your NAO amount is not enough
vote.vote_notice:
Voting Rules for NAO Governance Pool:
- Each user has only 1 vote, the decision will be reserved until the end of the voting period
- The amount of NAO users added to the Pool after voting will be automatically updated accordingto the voting decision
- Voting rate based on NAO contribution in Governance Pool
- Each proposal needs to be supported by more than 50% of the Total NAO in the Governance Pool to be approved and executed

nao_token.title: Buy NAO token
nao_token.description: Hold NAO to participate in Governance Pool or use as fee to enjoy a discount of 40%
nao_token.get_buy_now: Get Nami Exchange App to buy NAO now!
